T02D1903:1b-3: aargha'i chog / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1903:1b-4: sangs rgyas rgyal ba rnam 'phro shin tu rnam rgyal byang chub pa //
T02D1903:1b-5: [dd] rig ma'i lus sbyor las skyes bde bas shin tu khyab pa'i sku //
T02D1903:1b-6: 'khrul pa ma lus spangs shing 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad la //
T02D1903:1b-7: phyag byas nas ni 'dus pa'i gzhung gi aargha'i cho ga bshad //
T02D1903:1b-8: gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten ras ris gsung rab sku gzugs dang //
T02D1903:1b-9: khang bzangs gzhal med khang dang khyams dang rdzing bu wa chu rnams //
T02D1903:1b-10: khron pa chu mig shing bzangs ljon shing rnams kyi nags //
T02D1903:1b-11: rtsed mo'i de'u skyed mos tshal ni sbyin pa'i sa la mdor bsdus na'o //
T02D1903:1b-12: de la thog ma nyid du slob dpon gyi mtshan
T02D1903:1b-13: nyid dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gzhan gyis mandala sngon
T02D1903:1b-14: du song bas lan gnyis sam gsum gsol ba btab
T02D1903:1b-15: pas sam / rang nyid bsod nams 'dod pa la
T02D1903:1b-16: sogs pas gtsug lag khang brtsig pa'i phyir bgros pas
T02D1903:1b-17: nyin zhag dge ba rgyu skang bzang po la tho
T02D1903:1b-18: rangs kyi dus su sa brtag par bya'o //
T02D1903:2a-2: ko pi da ra ka ranydza dang yungs kar dgod //
T02D1903:2a-3: ri yi ze'u 'bras bur bcas dang rus sbal rgyan dang ni //
T02D1903:2a-4: glang po'i bshul pa lta bu'i sa ni rnam par spang //
T02D1903:2a-5: shar phyogs su ni pi pa la yi shing rnams dang //
T02D1903:2a-6: p'ag sha'i shing dang gshin rje'i phyogs su yang dag ldan //
T02D1903:2a-7: n+ya gro dha yi ljon shing rnams dang nub phyogs su //
T02D1903:2a-8: sa gzhi'i byang phyogs su ni ba ku la dang bcas //
T02D1903:2a-9: me yi mtshams su ka ku bhe dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1903:2a-10: pa la sha yi ljon shing srin po'i phyogs su grags //
T02D1903:2a-11: sa skyes shal ma li ni rlung gi phyogs su ste //
T02D1903:2a-12: dbang ldan au dumw'a rar bcas pa'i sa gzhi spang //
T02D1903:2a-13: mya ngan med dang pri yang ku dang ku sha nim //
T02D1903:2a-14: aa shvadtha mal mo tsa la ku tsa dang ni //
T02D1903:2a-15: aa smra da dim sa ni byang dang shar du gzhol //
T02D1903:2a-16: sa ni dkar ldan gru bzhi yang ni mtshan nyid bzang //
T02D1903:2a-17: de ru dong ni gru bzhir brkos te de nyid las //
T02D1903:2a-18: byung ba'i sa yis de ni dgang bar bya ba nyid //
T02D1903:2a-19: de ni gal te ma khengs na ni ma bsngags so //
T02D1903:2a-20: gal te sa ni dang po las lhag rab tu bsngags //
T02D1903:2a-21: sa yi khung bu mtho gang tsam du brkos nas su //
T02D1903:2a-22: de ni lhag med chu yis rab tu dgang bar bya //
T02D1903:2b-0: gom pa brgya ni song nas log ste blta @2b bar bya ;
T02D1903:2b-1: / chu ni gal te ma 'grib dge ba'o gzhan du gzhan //
T02D1903:2b-2: sa la gnas pa'i chu ni g-yas skor gyis //
T02D1903:2b-3: dbang ldan mtshams su myur du bab na ni //
T02D1903:2b-4: brtan byed sa gzhi shin tu dag pa ste //
T02D1903:2b-5: 'jigs pa'i dus su yang ni nyams pa med //
T02D1903:2b-6: de la de ltar sa'i mtshan nyid rig pa'i sngags
T02D1903:2b-7: pas lus bkru zhing dri zhim pas ji ltar rnyed
T02D1903:2b-8: pas gos dang rgyan dang cod pan dang bde ba'i
T02D1903:2b-10: dgos pa yong su tshang ba dang bsrung ba'i sngags
T02D1903:2b-11: bzlas pa 'grub pas lag pa rdo rje dang dril
T02D1903:2b-12: bu 'dzin pas mnyam par gzhag par bya ste /
T02D1903:2b-13: lha'i rnal 'byor byas nas dgongs ka zhi ba'i gtor ma byin te /
T02D1903:2b-14: dag pa'am sbyangs pa'i sa gzhir lci ba dang sas
T02D1903:2b-15: ba lang gi ko ba tsam byugs pa'i dbus su
T02D1903:2b-16: mandala bya ba 'am byed du gzhug go //
T02D1903:2b-17: de nas de ru dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rnam
T02D1903:2b-18: par bsgoms la mchod pa lnga yis de la yang
T02D1903:2b-20: gtor ma rgya chen po man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du sbyangs te /
T02D1903:2b-21: phyogs skyong ba thams cad la tu rya'i sgra dang bcas pas 'bul lo //
T02D1903:2b-22: de'i rjes la pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa
T02D1903:2b-23: la btsugs nas lus btud de sangs rgyas dang byang
T02D1903:2b-24: chub sems dpa' thams cad dang lha rnams las bslang
T02D1903:2b-25: bar bya'o // khams gsum gang na sangs rgyas dang //
T02D1903:2b-26: byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che //
T02D1903:2b-27: lha klu gnod sbyin chen po dang //
T02D1903:2b-28: dri za rnams dang lha min sogs //
T02D1903:2b-29: thams cad la ni gsol bar 'tshal //
T02D1903:2b-30: sems can kun gyi don bsgrub phyir //
T02D1903:2b-31: sa yi cha ni mdzes pa 'dir //
T02D1903:2b-32: gtsug lag 'byor ba rgyas phyir dang //
T02D1903:2b-33: thos dang bsam sogs 'phel ba yi //
T02D1903:2b-34: dam pa'i ches ni rtogs phyir dang //
T02D1903:2b-35: grags pa mthar thug gtsug lag khang //
T02D1903:2b-36: lus can kun gyi yang dag 'tsho //
T02D1903:2b-37: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
T02D1903:2b-38: bzang po 'di ni bdag phyir yang //
T02D1903:2b-39: khyed la gnod pa mi mnga' bas //
T02D1903:2b-40: grags pa dam pa bgyid par 'tshal //
T02D1903:2b-41: khyed kyis bzod cing gnang ba ni //
T02D1903:2b-42: bgyid par 'tshal gyi gzhan du min //
T02D1903:2b-43: rmi lam la sogs mtshan ma yis //
T02D1903:2b-44: dge ba'i sa 'di bdag la stsol //
T02D1903:2b-46: de ltar lan gsum brjod nas brjod nas aom mu tsu le sv'a h'a /
T02D1903:2b-47: aom mo h'a ni sv'a h'a /
T02D1903:3a-1: ston pa'i sngags 'dis lag pa g-yon pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu mngon par bsngags te /
T02D1903:3a-2: sa phyogs gtsang mar gos dang rgyan gtsang mas sngags lhor bstan te /
T02D1903:3a-3: ba shar du bltas pas seng ge'i nyal stabs kyis nyal bar bya'o //
T02D1903:3a-4: yang na rje btsun 'jig rten dbang phyug yang dag par mchod de /
T02D1903:3a-5: de dang nye bar snga ma bzhin nyal bar bya'o //
T02D1903:3a-6: tho rangs rmi lam gyi mtshan ma dge mi dge nye bar gzung bar bya ste /
T02D1903:3a-7: rmi lam sangs rgyas zhal mthong dang //
T02D1903:3a-8: mchod rten sku gzugs mchod pa dang //
T02D1903:3a-9: dam chos nyan dang de shes pa'i //
T02D1903:3a-10: dge slong dge 'dun mthong ba dang ;
T02D1903:3a-11: / gtsug lag khang dang sangs rgyas sras //
T02D1903:3a-12: dge slong ma rnams skyed mos tshal //
T02D1903:3a-14: chu bo rdzing bu rgya mtsho dang //
T02D1903:3a-15: ri bo can dang ri dags dang //
T02D1903:3a-16: ae na yang dang ba la bsngags //
T02D1903:3a-17: dur pa rma bya la sogs khyad 'phags 'dab gshog can //
T02D1903:3a-18: ting 'dzin ldan pas rmi lam du ni nges par mthong //
T02D1903:3a-19: bzhon pa glang chen khyu mchog dang ni sa 'dzin dang //
T02D1903:3a-20: gzhal med gnas mchog dpag bsam gyi ni shing rnams dang //
T02D1903:3a-21: dge bsnyen dang ni sdom can mi yi bdag po rnams //
T02D1903:3a-22: gsang sngags dbang phyug rnams dang bud med mchog /
T02D1903:3a-23: pha dang ma dang lha rnams dang ni bla ma dang //
T02D1903:3a-24: lha yi btsun mo rnams dang mchog gi gsang ba ba //
T02D1903:3a-25: sgrub po dam pa dang ni yon tan can dang gnyis skyes rnams //
T02D1903:3a-26: dga' ston chen po dang ni rgyal ba'i mchog gi dkyil 'khor rnams //
T02D1903:3a-27: rgyan rnams dang ni gos dang 'bru dang nor dang
T02D1903:3a-28: mchog / sbyin sreg las dang 'bras bu dang ni
T02D1903:3a-29: me tog rnams // rgyal po dbang bskur thob byed phun sum tshogs pa'i dngos //
T02D1903:3a-30: g-yul las rgyal dang rkun po bcings dang rang gi tshogs //
T02D1903:3a-31: rgya mtsho dang ni chu bo rnams dang 'phrang la sogs //
T02D1903:3a-32: rgal bar dka' ba rnams las nges par thar ba yang //
T02D1903:3a-33: der de lta bu la sogs pa'i rmi lam ni bzang ste /
T02D1903:3a-34: de las bzlog pa ni ngan par shes nas gal
T02D1903:3a-35: te ngan pa mthong na de'i tsho bgegs mthar mdzad
T02D1903:3a-37: chos thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu ste /
T02D1903:3b-0: rmi lam nye bar mi dmigs pa'i nye bar len pas so zhes lhag par @3b mos pas sam /
T02D1903:3b-1: yang na rmi lam ston pa'i sngags brjod pas //
T02D1903:3b-2: rmi lam ngan pa zhi bar bya'o //
T02D1903:3b-3: de nas rmi lam bzang po 'am bzang por bsgyur nas /
T02D1903:3b-4: aom bhu kham zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis nam mkha' lta bur bsams nas /
T02D1903:3b-5: h'um lam h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis rdo rje'i
T02D1903:3b-6: rdul phra rab kyi rang bzhin gyis gzhi rnam par
T02D1903:3b-7: bsgoms nas / aom me di n'i badzra bha ba
T02D1903:3b-8: badzra bandha h'um zhes bya ba 'dis byin gyis brlab
T02D1903:3b-9: bsgoms nas / par bya'o // de nas der lus
T02D1903:3b-10: phyed 'thon pa gser gyi mdog can rin po che'i
T02D1903:3b-11: bum pa phyag na bsnams shing na bza' dang rgyan
T02D1903:3b-12: mchog dang ldan pa'i sa'i lha mo mdun du rnam
T02D1903:3b-13: bsgoms nas / par bya'o // par bltas te /
T02D1903:3b-14: tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis lhag par gnas par
T02D1903:3b-15: bsgoms nas / par bya'o // par bltas te / bya'o // 'byung po kun gyi 'dren pa yin //
T02D1903:3b-16: spyod pa'i tshul gyi bya ba dang //
T02D1903:3b-17: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02D1903:3b-18: lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur //
T02D1903:3b-19: skyob pa sh'akya seng ge yis //
T02D1903:3b-20: ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa //
T02D1903:3b-21: de bzhin bdag gis bdud kyi sde //
T02D1903:3b-22: bcom nas gtsug lag khang mchog byed //
T02D1903:3b-24: lan gsum du ni bskul nas su //
T02D1903:3b-25: sa la yon chab la sogs pa //
T02D1903:3b-26: nye bar spyod pa legs mchod de //
T02D1903:3b-27: de nyid du ni thim par bsam //
T02D1903:3b-28: de nas yongs su dag pa thob pa'i sa'i char
T02D1903:3b-29: sems mgu ba'i sngags pas chos thams cad rang bzhin
T02D1903:3b-30: gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes lhag par mos pas
T02D1903:3b-31: chos thams cad kun du spyod do //
T02D1903:3b-32: sna tshogs padmar sna tshogs rdo rje'i stegs bu la //
T02D1903:3b-33: zla bar bh'um las dag pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa //
T02D1903:3b-34: de yi ltar gnas bhr'um gyi 'od kyi dra ba las //
T02D1903:3b-35: nges par 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnams //
T02D1903:3b-36: kun nas bsdus te gyur ba las ni khyad 'phags pa'i //
T02D1903:3b-37: rig ma mchog ni bzhi po las byung mdzes pa yi //
T02D1903:3b-38: khang pa brtseg pa thar pa'i grong khyer ngo mtshar can //
T02D1903:3b-39: nor bu chen po 'od 'bar ba yi rang bzhin rab tu blta //
T02D1903:3b-40: der ni dkyil 'khor dri bzangs sogs kyis byas nas ni //
T02D1903:3b-41: 'de la dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rnam par bsgom par bya //
T02D1903:3b-42: de la sna tshogs nyer spyod rnams kyis yang dag mchod //
T02D1903:3b-43: phyogs rnams su ni rim pa bzhin du gtor ma sbyin //
T02D1903:3b-44: de nas dri zhim po'i me tog dang bcas pa'i
T02D1903:3b-45: thal mos aom sarba ta th'a ga ta su la
T02D1903:4a-0: li ta / bi l'a si n'a mi tee rn'a m'a mi bha ga b'anta @4a * //
T02D1903:4a-2: pra t'itstsha ku su ma aanydza li n'a tha ho /
T02D1903:4a-3: zhes brjod bzhin du steng du bltas te snyim pas me tog gtor bar bya'o //
T02D1903:4a-4: de nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs
T02D1903:4a-5: te lag pa g-yas pas dri zhim po'i bdug spos
T02D1903:4a-6: kyi reng bu bzung nas sngags lce la h'um yig
T02D1903:4a-7: las byung ba'i rdo rje dkar po phra mo rnam
T02D1903:4a-8: par bsgoms nas / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T02D1903:4a-9: dpa' thams cad dang gzhan dag kyang snyan gsan dbab
T02D1903:4a-10: par bsgoms nas / par bya'o // bcom ldan che
T02D1903:4a-11: ge rdo rje mchog / rig pa'i rgyal po phyag
T02D1903:4a-12: par bsgoms nas / par bya'o // 'tshal stod //
T02D1903:4a-13: mgon po thugs rje'i bdag nyid bdag / gtsug lag
T02D1903:4a-15: slob ma rnams la phan phyir dang //
T02D1903:4a-16: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D1903:4a-17: bcom ldan gus byed bdag la ni //
T02D1903:4a-18: rjes su gzung bar mdzad pa'i rigs //
T02D1903:4a-20: sangs rgyas rnams dang dgra bcom pa //
T02D1903:4a-21: 'jig rten skyong dang gsang sngags lha //
T02D1903:4a-22: gang gzhan rnams dang 'jig rten skyong //
T02D1903:4a-23: lha rnams dang ni rdzogs sangs kyi //
T02D1903:4a-24: bstan la gnas pa'i 'byung po dang //
T02D1903:4a-25: sems can gang zhig bstan dga' ba //
T02D1903:4a-26: rdo rje'i mig ldan dgongs su gsol //
T02D1903:4a-27: rdo rje can bdag che ge mo //
T02D1903:4a-28: gtsug lag khang ni cho ga bzhin //
T02D1903:4a-29: 'gro ba rnams ni dag bya'i phyir //
T02D1903:4a-30: ci nus bya ba bgyid par 'tshal //
T02D1903:4a-31: de phyir bdag dang slob ma la //
T02D1903:4a-32: rjes su brtse bas nyer dgongs te //
T02D1903:4a-34: gdan ni gnod par mdzad pa'i rigs //
T02D1903:4a-35: de ltar lan gsum brjod pas snyan gsan phab nas yang dag par mchod de bstod pa yang bya'o //
T02D1903:4a-36: de nas legs par brtags shing shin tu mnyam pa'i sa'i char stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02D1903:4a-37: mdun du chu gtsang ku sha'i tshom bu dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1903:4a-38: 'om d'ur ba dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1903:4a-39: dri chu me tog dkar po dang bcas pa chu
T02D1903:4a-40: la sogs pa'i snod yongs su bzlas pa rnams g-yon
T02D1903:4a-42: ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas bum pa lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D1903:4a-43: de la nag po dang rtsa ba med pa /
T02D1903:4a-45: mgrin pa ring ba lto ba che bar nas dang
T02D1903:4b-0: gro dang 'bras so ba dang ma sha dar @4b
T02D1903:4b-2: bri ha ti dang ka nda ka ri dang aa par dzi ta dkar po dang /
T02D1903:4b-3: ha sa dang ha sa de ba rnams te sman lnga dang /
T02D1903:4b-4: gser dang dngul dang mu teg dang byi ru dang /
T02D1903:4b-5: mu men te rin po che lnga dang ldan pa /
T02D1903:4b-6: dri'i chus gang btsu ta la sogs pa'i yal gas
T02D1903:4b-7: kha brgyan pa gos zung gis mgrin pa dkris pa
T02D1903:4b-8: ; de la chos 'byung gi nang du gnas pa rang gi lha'i mtshan mas mtshan pa /
T02D1903:4b-9: yi ge bam las rin po che'i rang bzhin las
T02D1903:4b-10: byas nas gdugs dang bcas par 'khor dang bcas pa'i
T02D1903:4b-11: bdag por kun tu btags te /
T02D1903:4b-12: me tog gi phreng bas dkris pa'i rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i steng du bzhag ste ;
T02D1903:4b-13: lag pa g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje dang
T02D1903:4b-14: 'brel pa'i me tog gi phreng ba'i rtse mo bzung
T02D1903:4b-15: nas / sngags pas yi ge gsum dang spel te
T02D1903:4b-16: rang gi lha'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o
T02D1903:4b-17: nas / // de bzhin du gzhan dkyil 'khor ba'i
T02D1903:4b-18: bum pa rnams kyang cho ga de bzhin du lha
T02D1903:4b-19: rang rang gi mtshan mas mtshan pa byas nas dkyil
T02D1903:4b-20: 'khor ba'i lhas byin gyis brlabs pa rnams la rang
T02D1903:4b-21: rang gi sngags yi ge gsum dang spel ba lan
T02D1903:4b-22: bdun du mngon par bzla bar bya'o //
T02D1903:4b-23: de bzhin du gzhi bdag gi bum pa yang ji
T02D1903:4b-24: lta bar rang gi mtshan mas mtshan pa rnams la
T02D1903:4b-25: yi ge gsum dang spel bas rang rang gi sngags
T02D1903:4b-26: bzlas par bya'o // thams cad kyang srog ldan nya
T02D1903:4b-27: dang bcas pa rnams la rim pa bzhin lhag par
T02D1903:4b-29: bsang gtor la sogs pa byas te mchod pa lngas yang dag par mchod de /
T02D1903:4b-30: dril bu dkrol bzhin pas bstod par bya'o //
T02D1903:4b-31: de nas las byed kyi skyes bu bgegs mthar byed kyi rnam par bsgoms te /
T02D1903:4b-32: rgya dang zabs su khru do ba'i dong gru bzhi par brkos la dbang ldan du de'i tshad dam /
T02D1903:4b-33: de'i phyed du zlum por brkos te srol btod nas
T02D1903:4b-34: gnyis ka lci ba dang sa dang chu rnams kyis
T02D1903:4b-35: byug go // de nas aargha la sogs pa byin
T02D1903:4b-36: nas dong gru bzhi par go rims bzhin rnam par
T02D1903:4b-37: rgyal ba la sogs pa'i bum pa rnams kyis chu
T02D1903:4b-38: byug go // blugs par bya'o // der shar ram
T02D1903:4b-39: byang du ba ltas te nya rnams 'phyo ba na
T02D1903:4b-40: gtsug lag khang 'khor dang bcas pa myur du 'grub
T02D1903:4b-42: de nas de'i sbubs phye ste dong zlum por chu btang ngo //
T02D1903:4b-43: de'i chu'i bskor phyogs brtag par bya'o //
T02D1903:5a-0: gal te chu g-yas skor du 'bab na @5a * //
T02D1903:5a-1: der dge slong brtul zhugs dam pa yon tan rnams nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1903:5a-2: de'i rjes la klu ma lus pa dbang du bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1903:5a-3: der 'o ma can gyi yal ga rnams kyis g-yogs
T02D1903:5a-4: te nyi ma la gnas pa'i dzam yig las byung
T02D1903:5a-5: ba'i rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1903:5a-6: dzam gu li sku mdog ser po zhal ser po dang nag po dang dkar po /
T02D1903:5a-7: gdengs ka bdun gyis brgyan pa /
T02D1903:5a-8: rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02D1903:5a-9: rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rang snang gi thabs la 'khyud pa /
T02D1903:5a-10: g-yas gnyis na rdo rje dang mda' 'dzin pa /
T02D1903:5a-11: g-yon gnyis kyis gzhu dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa can /
T02D1903:5a-12: sna tshogs pa'i na bza' dang bcas pa'i sprul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D1903:5a-13: nyi ma'i gdan dang 'od can bsgoms nas bdag nyid
T02D1903:5a-14: kyang dzam gu li'i gzugs su rnam par bsgoms te
T02D1903:5a-15: / sa 'og tu dmigs nas sna tshogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi bsgom par bya'o ;
T02D1903:5a-16: / de'i tshe yang ltad mo ba'i skye bo rnams tambo la dang dri zhim po'i me tog dang /
T02D1903:5a-17: tsandan la sogs pa byin pas mgu bar bya'o //
T02D1903:5a-18: de nas bsrung ba'i don du mchod sbyin gyi shing
T02D1903:5a-19: ngam seng ldeng gi rang bzhin las bde bar gshegs
T02D1903:5a-20: pa'i sor gyi brgyad kyi tshad du steng dang 'og
T02D1903:5a-21: rtse lnga ba dang rtse gcig pa'i rdo rje'i rnam
T02D1903:5a-22: pa can tsandan dmar pos byugs pa me tog dang
T02D1903:5a-23: skud pa dang / yungs kar dang bcas pa rnams
T02D1903:5a-24: la bgegs mthar byed kyi sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa
T02D1903:5a-25: brgyad bzlas te gdab par bya'o //
T02D1903:5a-26: aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta la /
T02D1903:5a-28: k'i la ya k'i la ya sarba p'a pam h'um h'um h'um /
T02D1903:5a-29: badzra k'i la ya badzra dha rod aadzny'a pa ya
T02D1903:5a-30: ti k'a ya w'a ka tsinta badzra k'i la ya
T02D1903:5a-31: h'um phat ces bya ba'i sngags 'dis phyogs thams cad
T02D1903:5a-33: slar yang bgegs thams cad rnam par gzhig pa'i ched
T02D1903:5a-34: du rang rang gi phyogs su son pa'i dpung dang
T02D1903:5a-35: bu dang chung mar bcas pa'i dbang po la sogs
T02D1903:5a-36: pa rnams bzhengs par 'gyur ba'i gtsug lag khang gi
T02D1903:5a-37: dbus sam / dbang ldan du gcig tu gnas par bltas la /
T02D1903:5a-38: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba stong khro bo smad mdung gi
T02D1903:5a-39: rnam pas sngags de nyid kyi blos phur bu gdab
T02D1903:5a-40: par bya'o // de nas phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor bgegs
T02D1903:5b-0: med par rnam @5b bar bsgoms nas sgrub pa'i grogs
T02D1903:5b-1: dang lhan cig tu rdo rje khu tshur gyis thig
T02D1903:5b-2: skud bzung nas g-yas skor du 'khor bas thig gdab
T02D1903:5b-4: de nas slob dpon me'i mtshams nas byang du kha bltas te /
T02D1903:5b-5: sgrub pa'i grogs dbang ldan nas lho ru mngon par phyogs pas shar gyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D1903:5b-6: de nas rlung gi mtshams su song ste lho ru mngon par phyogs ba dang /
T02D1903:5b-7: srin po'i mtshams nas byang du bltas pas nub kyi cha thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D1903:5b-8: slar yang g-yas skor gyis rlung gi mtshams su song
T02D1903:5b-9: ste dbang ldan du gnas pa dang byang gi cha
T02D1903:5b-11: de bzhin me'i mtshams su song nas srin por 'dug pa dang /
T02D1903:5b-13: de'i tshe yang sngags pas dge mi dge'i mtshan ma brtag par bya ste /
T02D1903:5b-14: de tshe gal te dge slong ngam //
T02D1903:5b-15: bram ze mnyam gzhag 'ongs pa na //
T02D1903:5b-16: sbyin bdag la ni dge ba ste //
T02D1903:5b-17: zhi dang rgyas pa chen po byed //
T02D1903:5b-18: mkhas pa 'ongs par gyur pa na //
T02D1903:5b-19: rgyal po'i phun sum tshogs pa ston //
T02D1903:5b-20: gal te ba lang 'ongs pa na //
T02D1903:5b-22: bum pa gang ba 'ongs na ni //
T02D1903:5b-23: nor dang so ba la sogs 'phel //
T02D1903:5b-25: ba lang ma he la sogs rnyed //
T02D1903:5b-26: gal te dga' byed gzugs ldan ma //
T02D1903:5b-28: me tog la sogs 'ongs na ni //
T02D1903:5b-30: sgur po mi'u thung rdum po sogs //
T02D1903:5b-31: yan lag dman dang mtha' skyes dag / de tshe der ni 'ongs pa na ;
T02D1903:5b-32: / dge legs byed 'gyur the tshom med //
T02D1903:5b-33: gtor zan bya rgod kang ka sogs //
T02D1903:5b-34: dur khrod bya ni gal te ni //
T02D1903:5b-35: steng gi nam mkhar rgyu ba na //
T02D1903:5b-37: don rig pa yis thig 'debs tshe //
T02D1903:5b-38: de phyir brtag par bya ba ste //
T02D1903:5b-39: mi dge'i rtags ni byung ba na //
T02D1903:5b-40: mkhas pas thig ni bshol bar bya //
T02D1903:5b-41: gang du las kyis bskul ba yis //
T02D1903:5b-42: gal te thig ni 'gom pa na //
T02D1903:5b-43: 'og na de yi rigs kyi ni //
T02D1903:5b-44: rus pa yod par mkhas pas bshad //
T02D1903:5b-45: gzhan yang cho ga ji bzhin du //
T02D1903:5b-46: blo ldan rdo du ma de ni gdon //
T02D1903:5b-47: gal te rdo de ma bton na //
T02D1903:6a-2: rus pa'i zug rdus lus ni mdzes byed cing //
T02D1903:6a-3: sol ba'i zug rdus me yi 'jigs pa skyed //
T02D1903:6a-4: thal bas nor brlag mi yi rus pas 'chi //
T02D1903:6a-5: sbrul sogs zug rdus sna tshogs nad la sogs //
T02D1903:6a-6: rdo brdul dang bye ma sen mo skra dang pa gas pa dang //
T02D1903:6a-7: shing dang pha gu bshad pa phub ma lcags dang chor ma sogs //
T02D1903:6a-8: zug rdu rnams kyis bcing dang brdeg sogs rnam pa mang po yi //
T02D1903:6a-9: nyon mongs rnams skyed de phyir zug rdu chung yang brtags te gzhom //
T02D1903:6a-10: de nas las kyi rdo rje yis //
T02D1903:6a-11: rtsig pa'i rmang ni rim pa bzhin //
T02D1903:6a-12: gzhi bdag klu ni legs brtags te //
T02D1903:6a-13: tho rangs bsod nams 'phel phyir brko //
T02D1903:6a-14: mon gre tha skar smin drug zla ba dang //
T02D1903:6a-15: nyi ma'i 'gros kyis dbang po'i phyogs su mgo / gshin rjer kha bltas klu ni nyal 'gyur te //
T02D1903:6a-16: thams cad du yang g-yon pa phab nas so //
T02D1903:6a-17: mgo dang rgyal mchu rnams la mgo bo ni //
T02D1903:6a-18: gshin rje'i phyogs su ston pa kho na ste /
T02D1903:6a-19: nub tu kha bltas lus kyi dang po ni //
T02D1903:6a-20: mi yi cha byad ro smad sbrul dang 'dra //
T02D1903:6a-21: dbo dang nag pa sa ga'i zla ba la //
T02D1903:6a-22: byang gi phyogs su kha ni bltas gyur te //
T02D1903:6a-23: stobs chen sa gzhi bzhi ni bdag po'i klu //
T02D1903:6a-24: sngas ni nub kyi phyogs su bstan te nya la //
T02D1903:6a-25: snron dang chu stod byi bzhin rnams la ni //
T02D1903:6a-26: klu ni gzhogs kyis nyal bar byed pa ste //
T02D1903:6a-27: chur ni mgo bo bstan te shar phyogs su //
T02D1903:6a-28: kha bltas gzhi ni thams cad non par ro //
T02D1903:6a-29: kun du gal te klu 'di yis //
T02D1903:6a-30: snying ga'i mdun du brkos pa na //
T02D1903:6a-31: sbyin bdag gi ni 'dod pa yi //
T02D1903:6a-32: dngos grub 'byung bar the tshom med //
T02D1903:6a-33: gal te mgo bor brkos na ni //
T02D1903:6a-34: pha ma snying grogs rtsa lag dang //
T02D1903:6a-35: bu dang bu mo la sogs rnams //
T02D1903:6a-36: nges par brlag par 'gyur ba yin //
T02D1903:6a-37: gal te rgyab tu brkos na ni //
T02D1903:6a-38: gnas nyams dga' ba'am yang na 'chi //
T02D1903:6a-39: mjug ma'i cha yis myur du yang //
T02D1903:6a-40: ba lang ma he sogs brlag 'gyur //
T02D1903:6a-41: de ltar cho ga bzhin g-yas skor gyis snying ga'i mdun du brkos nas /
T02D1903:6a-42: zug rdu thams cad kyang rnam par skyangs te slob
T02D1903:6a-43: dpon gyis g-yas skor du rim pa bzhin du kun
T02D1903:6b-0: nas grags pa @6b dang ldan pa'i gnas brtag par
T02D1903:6b-1: bya'o // de nas yon bdag dang /
T02D1903:6b-2: sa dang gnas kyi lha dang phyogs skyong dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang /
T02D1903:6b-4: mi'i bdag po la sogs pa'i zhi ba'i don du
T02D1903:6b-5: dgongs mo zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas nas gtor ma
T02D1903:6b-6: gtang bar bya'o // de nas tshes grangs bzang po
T02D1903:6b-7: la yon bdag gi rjes su mthun pa'i gza' dang
T02D1903:6b-8: rgyu skar dang dus sbyor dang yud tsam la //
T02D1903:6b-9: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs thams cad du ba dan
T02D1903:6b-10: dkar po dang dmar po dang ser po dang sngon
T02D1903:6b-11: po dang dud mdog dang tshon sna tshogs dang ser
T02D1903:6b-12: po dang ljang gu rnams btsugs te sa gzhir me
T02D1903:6b-13: tog dri zhim bo gcal bkram nas /
T02D1903:6b-14: dri zhim po'i spos khang mang po bkod de /
T02D1903:6b-15: shin tu gsal ba'i mar me'i phreng ba'i tshogs rnams dang //
T02D1903:6b-16: dri chu zhim pos bsangs te dam pa'i chos bklag pa dang /
T02D1903:6b-18: bkra shis dang glu dang turya'i sgra dang bud med
T02D1903:6b-19: bzang mo rnams kyi ca co dang gzha'i sgra dang
T02D1903:6b-20: bcas pas phyogs kyi tshogs nas sa gzhi nger byed
T02D1903:6b-21: du bcug nas ltad mo ba'i skye bo rnams mgu
T02D1903:6b-22: bar bya'o // de nas sbyin bdag dang gzhan dag
T02D1903:6b-23: gi yang rgyas pa'i don du sngags pa gos bzang
T02D1903:6b-24: po dang rgyan dang cod pan dang /
T02D1903:6b-25: yo byad yongs su tshang bas rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg
T02D1903:6b-26: byas nas yon bdag gis kyang de'i tshe gal te
T02D1903:6b-27: nus na rgyal po dbang por byas nas de'i bka'
T02D1903:6b-29: rtsig mkhan rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas gos la
T02D1903:6b-30: sogs pa'i sbyin pas yongs su mgu bar byas te
T02D1903:6b-31: / pha gu 'dzeg tu gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1903:6b-32: de'i rjes la dga' ba'i yid kyis rang gi 'byor
T02D1903:6b-33: pa dang mthun pas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i
T02D1903:6b-34: bu mo dang / glang po dang rta dang ba lang dang ma he la sogs pa'i nor dang /
T02D1903:6b-35: gser dang dngul dang zangs dang nor bu dang mu tig la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams dang /
T02D1903:6b-36: rgyan dang gos bzang po rnams dang /
T02D1903:6b-37: me tog yongs su rgyas pa'i zhing /
T02D1903:6b-39: kun dga' ra ba la sogs pa'i gnas dang /
T02D1903:6b-41: bran mo la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams mngon par 'dod
T02D1903:6b-42: pa'i dgos pa bsgrub pa'i phyir thams cad kyis slob
T02D1903:7a-0: de'i rjes la slob dpon gyis bsang gtor la sogs pa phul nas yang dag par @7a * //
T02D1903:7a-1: mchod de bstod pa byas nas bdud rtsi myang ba
T02D1903:7a-2: byas te yi ge brgya pa lan bdun brjod nas
T02D1903:7a-3: phyag byas te / bzod pa gsol nas sbyin sreg rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1903:7a-4: sangs rgyas la sogs pa gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1903:7a-5: de nas yon bdag slob dpon gyi mdun du byas
T02D1903:7a-6: te rang gi khyim du song nas dge slong dang
T02D1903:7a-7: dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma
T02D1903:7a-8: la sogs pa rnams la chos ston drangs te yon
T02D1903:7a-9: yang phul nas slar gshegs par bya'o //
T02D1903:7a-10: de nas slob dpon 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dang /
T02D1903:7a-11: rtsig mkhan dang las byed rnams dang /
T02D1903:7a-12: gzhan dag la yang ston mo byin nas nus pa
T02D1903:7a-13: dang mthun par phul te bzod pa gsol nas slar
T02D1903:7a-14: gtang ngo // mtshan mo tshogs kyi 'khor lo byas
T02D1903:7a-15: nas phyogs skyong la sogs pa rnams la gtor ma
T02D1903:7a-16: gtang ngo // phul te / thams cad nye bar bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D1903:7a-17: gtsug lag khang gi aargha'i cho ga'o /
T02D1903:7a-19: // / de bzhin du mchod rten dang /
T02D1903:7a-20: gzhal med khang khyams kyi aargha yang rig par bya'o //
T02D1903:7a-21: gtsug lag khang sogs zhig ral rnying //
T02D1903:7a-23: gtor ma la sogs byin nas ni //
T02D1903:7a-24: der gnas lha ni spo bar bya //
T02D1903:7a-25: phyi nas snying rje'i bdag can gyis //
T02D1903:7a-26: rim pa bzhin du bcos nas ni //
T02D1903:7a-27: rdzogs par mthong nas spros pa de //
T02D1903:7a-28: der ni snga ma bzhin du gzhag /
T02D1903:7a-29: ces bya ba ni gtsug lag khang la sogs pa rnying pa dang zhig ral gyi aargha'i cho ga'o /
T02D1903:7a-31: // / de nas ras ris la sogs pa brtsam par
T02D1903:7a-32: 'dod pa'i sngags pas stan bde ba la 'dug ste
T02D1903:7a-33: / zhi ba'i gtor ma btang nas chos thams cad
T02D1903:7a-34: rang bzhin gyis dag par lhag par mos par byas
T02D1903:7a-35: / te / brtsams pa'i lha'am rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1903:7a-36: kyi rnal 'byor byas nas de nas nam mkhar sangs
T02D1903:7a-37: rgyas la sogs pa mngon par bltas te /
T02D1903:7a-38: snyim pa'i me tog gtor nas phyag byas te cho ga bzhin lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D1903:7a-39: de'i rjes la gos gtsang ma 'am //
T02D1903:7a-40: shing la sogs pa rnams la ji lta bar rang
T02D1903:7a-41: gi lha'i sa bon yongs su gyur pa las phyag
T02D1903:7a-42: mtshan sa bon gyis mtshan pa de yongs su gyur
T02D1903:7a-43: pa las zhal gsum phyag drug pa /
T02D1903:7a-44: rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs sku mdog dang phyag mtshan
T02D1903:7b-0: dang @7b gdan dang 'od can thugs kar mtshan ma
T02D1903:7b-1: dang sa bon gyis byin gyis brlabs pa /
T02D1903:7b-2: snying ga dang spyi bo dang lkog mar yi ge h'um dang aom dang a'a:/
T02D1903:7b-3: zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa la rigs dang
T02D1903:7b-4: mthun pa'i cod pan can snyoms par zhugs pa skad
T02D1903:7b-5: cig mas grub pa'i lha rnam par bsgoms nas mchod
T02D1903:7b-6: pa lnga yis mchod de bstod pa bya ba'o //
T02D1903:7b-7: de nas bzo byed rnams bgegs mthar byed kyi gzugs
T02D1903:7b-8: can la lus dang ngag dang yid la phyag mtshan
T02D1903:7b-9: dang sa bon gyis byin gyis brlabs pa rnam par
T02D1903:7b-10: bsams nas de'i lag pa g-yon dang g-yas dag zla
T02D1903:7b-11: ba rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs la bdud rtsi 'khyil
T02D1903:7b-12: ba'i sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad du pir ngang
T02D1903:7b-13: tshon la sogs pa bsngags te shes rab kyi ye
T02D1903:7b-14: shes kyi bdud rtsir rnam par bsgoms nas slar yang
T02D1903:7b-15: yi ge brgya pa'i sngags kyis brtan par byas te
T02D1903:7b-16: gtad nas rtsom du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1903:7b-17: de nas bsang gtor la sogs pa phul te legs
T02D1903:7b-18: par mchod de bstod pa byas nas bdud rtsi myang
T02D1903:7b-19: ba byas te / sangs rgyas la sogs pa gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1903:7b-20: de nas phyogs skyong ba rnams la gtor ma btang
T02D1903:7b-21: nas slob dpon dang las byed dang gzhan dag kyang
T02D1903:7b-22: ston mo byin te nus pa bzhin yon phul nas
T02D1903:7b-23: gtang bar bya'o // ras ris la sogs pa'i aargha'i cho ga'o /
T02D1903:7b-25: // / dam chos glegs bam rtsom pa yis //
T02D1903:7b-26: cho ga de bzhin byas nas ni //
T02D1903:7b-27: shog bu la ni dhi las byung //
T02D1903:7b-28: shes rab pha rol phyin bltas nas //
T02D1903:7b-29: de yongs gyur las byung ba yi //
T02D1903:7b-30: yi ge'i phreng ni blta bar bya //
T02D1903:7b-31: snag tsha myu gu yongs bzlas te //
T02D1903:7b-32: brtsam par bya ba nyid yin no //
T02D1903:7b-33: de dag la bzlas pa'i sngags ni //
T02D1903:7b-34: aom dhi su ti smri ti ma ti bi dza
T02D1903:7b-35: ye sartha aadzny'a na pa ta l'a pa ha ri
T02D1903:7b-37: slob dpon dang ni 'dri mkhan la 'ang //
T02D1903:7b-38: ston mo drangs nas nan tan gyis //
T02D1903:7b-39: yon phul nas ni gtang bya ste //
T02D1903:7b-40: lhag pa sngar bzhin rig par bya //
T02D1903:7b-41: gsang sngags kyi glegs bam rtsom pa na yang snga ma bzhin thams cad bya ste /
T02D1903:7b-42: shog bu la sa bon dang phyag mtshan gyi sa
T02D1903:7b-43: bon yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i 'od dpag
T02D1903:7b-44: med yongs su gyur pa bris pa'i yi ge'i tshogs
T02D1903:8a-0: @8a * // kyis dkrigs par rnam par bsgom mo //
T02D1903:8a-1: lhag ma ni thang ka rtsom pa'i cho ga bzhin bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1903:8a-2: yang na ni dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam yang cho ga 'di nyid kyis bya'o //
T02D1903:8a-3: gsung rab kyi aargha'i cho ga'o /
T02D1903:8a-5: // / de nas gtor ma gtong ba yi //
T02D1903:8a-6: yo byad cho gas phul nas ni //
T02D1903:8a-7: sngags pas lhag gnas byas nas su //
T02D1903:8a-8: bsang gtor la sogs byin nas ni //
T02D1903:8a-9: der ni chu lha'i gzugs can du //
T02D1903:8a-10: rnam par snang mdzad blta bar bya //
T02D1903:8a-11: sbrul zhags ral gri rin chen dang //
T02D1903:8a-12: chu skyes shes rab snyoms 'jug dkar //
T02D1903:8a-13: yi ge aom la sogs pa dang //
T02D1903:8a-14: badzra ba ru na h'um zhes brjod //
T02D1903:8a-15: de yongs gyur las byung ba yi //
T02D1903:8a-16: rigs brgyad klu yi pho brang ni //
T02D1903:8a-17: ye shes bdud rtsi'i chus gang ba //
T02D1903:8a-18: zhi ba'i klu yis byin gyis brlabs //
T02D1903:8a-19: dngos kun gyis ni rnam bsams nas //
T02D1903:8a-20: slar yang gsang sngags brjod par bya //
T02D1903:8a-21: aom badzra sa ma ya stvam zhes bya'o //
T02D1903:8a-22: sa 'og mthar thug yan lag ni //
T02D1903:8a-23: brgyad ldan chu yis yongs gang ba //
T02D1903:8a-24: chu yi rgyun ni blta bya ste //
T02D1903:8a-25: gzhan ni thams cad snga ma bzhin //
T02D1903:8a-26: zhes bya ba ni rdzing bu dang wa chu dang khron pa la sogs pa'i aargha'i cho ga'o /
T02D1903:8a-28: // / cho ga bzhin du mchod pa dang //
T02D1903:8a-29: lhag gnas sngar bzhin byas nas ni //
T02D1903:8a-30: nang gi sa yi sbyang ba ni //
T02D1903:8a-31: rim bzhin dag par bya ba ste //
T02D1903:8a-32: blo ldan mnyam par bzhag pa yis //
T02D1903:8a-33: gsang sngags brjod de byin gyis brlab //
T02D1903:8a-34: rol mo'i gnas ni nyams dga' bar //
T02D1903:8a-35: sangs rgyas la sogs bsgom bya ste //
T02D1903:8a-36: de nas sbyin sreg kyang ni btab //
T02D1903:8a-37: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras de bzhin //
T02D1903:8a-38: gzhan yang lha rnams thams cad la //
T02D1903:8a-39: mkhyen bya de nas bzod par gsol //
T02D1903:8a-40: rdzogs sangs lha mo de sras dang //
T02D1903:8a-41: tshangs sogs lha yi tshogs kyis gang //
T02D1903:8a-42: cho ga mtshang bzod mdzad rigs //
T02D1903:8a-43: thams cad du yang sbyin bdag ni //
T02D1903:8a-44: zhi dang rgyas chen mdzad nas kyang //
T02D1903:8a-45: slar yang 'byon par mdzad slad du //
T02D1903:8a-46: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol //
T02D1903:8a-47: thams cad du bzod pa gsol ba dang gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so //
T02D1903:8a-49: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D1903:8b-0: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos @8b grub stsol //
T02D1903:8b-1: slar yang 'byon par mdzad pa'i phyir //
T02D1903:8b-2: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol //
T02D1903:8b-3: aom badzra mu: / zhes bya ba 'dis gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1903:8b-4: kun dga' ra ba dang rol mo'i de'u dang ldum ra'i sbyin pa'i sa gzhi'i aargha'i cho ga'o /
T02D1903:8b-6: // / dpal ldan gsang 'dus gsung ba yi //
T02D1903:8b-7: cho ga gang zhig ma tshang ba //
T02D1903:8b-8: spyi rgyud gsungs pa'i cho ga la //
T02D1903:8b-9: brten nas de ni bskangs pa yin //
T02D1903:8b-10: dpal ldan zhi ba bzang po'i zhabs kyi sprin las byung //
T02D1903:8b-11: man ngag chu rgyun dri med phun tshogs thob pa yis //
T02D1903:8b-12: snang byed zla ba'i sa gzhi la ni gang skyes pa'i //
T02D1903:8b-13: 'dus pa'i aargha'i cho ga'i lo tog 'gro la bsngo //
T02D1903:8b-14: nyon mongs 'phrog byed aargha'i cho ga byas pa las //
T02D1903:8b-15: bdag la rnam dag bsod nams skyes pa gang gyur pa //
T02D1903:8b-16: de yis 'gro ba ma lus rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
T02D1903:8b-17: sems can gyi ni dgongs pa mdzad pa nyid du shog //
T02D1903:8b-18: aargha'i cho ga snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba
T02D1903:8b-19: slob dpon snang byed zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so
T02D1903:8b-21: / // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ba rendra ba'i zhal snga nas dang /
